Moo::RenderTargetSetter

Moo::RenderTargetSetter Class Reference

RenderTargetSetter is an effect constant binding that holds a reference to a render target and sets its texture on effects on demand. More...

Detailed Description

RenderTargetSetter is an effect constant binding that holds a reference to a render target and sets its texture on effects on demand.
